titleStmt.title: A Pretious apple proceeding from the tree of life, or, A Sweet and seasonable word, dropping from the lips of the righteous. Being an effectuall meanes to preserve the lives of men, sincerely applying it from generation, to generation. : Presented to the view of that terrible army, who under God have been a defence unto us, from the monsterous, wild, ravenning and venemous beasts of the howling wildernes.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
